resources.string: Each player will be assigned the WHITE SPARTAN disks or the GREEN SPARTAN disks. Players will alternate turns dragging their disks in a desire locations or "slot", upon availability of each slot. The object of the game is to have a vertical, horizontal or diagonal of four consecutive disks. First player to obtain a "connect four" wins. The player can undo there previous drag, but before selecting the "done" button, which will trade off turns.
